title: Businessweek Extra - Bloomberg’s Brad Stone on Amazon
itunes:title: Businessweek Extra - Bloomberg’s Brad Stone on Amazon
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring an in-depth conversation with Bloomberg’s Brad Stone on Amazon GO, Amazon Prime day and Big Tech’s recent trip to Washington D.C.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
